column6: We meet currently a problem to get offers by date by API from S28. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to get offers using SubmitOfferPackage from API from S37. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to update offers using SubmitOfferPackage from API from S32. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to get best offers from API from S12. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to get message for each product created using our API method GetProductPackageSubmissionResult from S15. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to get products information using our API method GetProductListByIdentifier from S29. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
A problem has been detected in order to get orders from API from S22. Our teams are mobilized to resolved this issue.
We meet currently a problem with order status updates by API and inconsistencies on dematerialised product sheets. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to get stocks information using our API method GetProductStockList from S37. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
